data.name: Criminal Russia
data.detailed_description:
Criminal Russia is an adrenaline-fueled thriller full of primal brutality, dangerous shootouts and a complex high-quality storyline! The scene of action is a prototype of modern Russia in an alternative reality. You will learn the story of three extremely mysterious anti-heroes.

Main features:

  • Surreal storyline!
  • A large arsenal of weapons!
  • As funny as it may sound, but the complexity! Nowadays, people are afraid to make complex games that give an exciting gaming experience, but GasivoGames does not apply to such people!
  • Unique sound design!
  • Unexpected plot twists! And you really never know what will happen in the next second!
  • 18 different levels! A depressive drug den? We have it! Neon noir? And why not? A police depot? Ha! Yes, please! And this is only a small part of what awaits you!
For suggestions: sashanyashy@gmail.com

data.short_description: Criminal Russia is an adrenaline-fueled thriller full of primal brutality, dangerous shootouts and a complex high-quality storyline! The scene of action is a prototype of modern Russia in an alternative reality.
data.supported_languages:
English, Russian*, German, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8.1 32 & 64 Bit, Windows 8 32 & 64 Bit, Windows 7 32 & 64 Bit, Windows 10 32 & 64-Bit
  • Processor: 2.4GHZ Dual Core Processor Or Higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Linux
  • Processor: 2.4GHZ Dual Core Processor Or Higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes:
The developers describe the content like this:

This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: General Mature Content
